Class Occurance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.utils.Occurance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Occurance>

    public class Occurance
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Occurance>
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: Timo Homburg Date: 03.12.13 Time: 17:42 Class for modelling an occurance instance containing a relative and abolute word position as well as its amount.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Integer aboluteWordPosition
      The absolute position within the word.
      private java.lang.Integer occuranceAmount
      The Amount of this occurance at its specified relative and absolute position.
      private java.lang.Integer relativeWordPosition
      0 for begin, 1 for middle, 2 for end, 3 for single
